title: Vertex AI - Vertex AI Workbench Jupyter Notebook tutorials
abstract:
# Vertex AI - Vertex AI Workbench Jupyter Notebook tutorials
# Vertex AI Workbench Jupyter Notebook tutorials
This page contains a list of Jupyter Notebook tutorials for Vertex AI Workbench. These end-to-end tutorials help you get started using Vertex AI Workbench and give you ideas for how to implement a specific project.
content:
## Open the notebooks
These tutorials highlight specific Vertex AI Workbench capabilities but you can also use them in other environments, such as [Colaboratory (Colab)](https://research.google.com/colaboratory/) .
To open a notebook tutorial in a Vertex AI Workbench instance:
- Click the **Vertex AI Workbench** link in  the [notebook list](#notebook-list) .  The link opens the Vertex AI Workbench console.
- In the **Deploy to notebook** screen, type a name for your new  Vertex AI Workbench instance and click **Create** .
- In the **Ready to open notebook** dialog that appears after the instance starts,  click **Open** .
- On the **Confirm deployment to notebook server** page, select **Confirm** .
- Before running the notebook, select **Kernel > Restart Kernel
 and Clear all Outputs** .
To open a notebook tutorial in Colab, click the **Colab** link in the [notebook list](#notebook-list) . Colab creates a VM instance with all needed dependencies, launches the Colab environment, and loads the notebook.
## List of notebooks
By default, the following table shows a list of Vertex AI Workbench notebook tutorials. To see a list of other Vertex AI Jupyter notebooks, click the drop-down menu and select a service.
Add a <devsite-select> custom element and give it a unique 'id'.
